   <media:thumbnail url="https://i3.ytimg.com/vi/joYJahY4FUI/hqdefault.jpg" width="480" height="360"/>
   <media:description>What if continents and oceans switched places? The Pacific becomes a supercontinent. Earth's deepest point is Everest Deep, and is almost nine kilometers below sea-level. And the Mid-Atlantic Canyon divides the world from pole to pole. Life finds a way but struggles in this new, upside-down, inverted world. This all sounds cool, until the oxygen runs out... 

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science #invertedearth #whatif
